A crowd of people are flocking toward the docks and a dazzling blue light is being emitted from a funky and luxurious looking boat. You join the crowd and stop in front of the boat. A man in a fancy purple suit welcomes the crowd gathering in a circle around him and the boat. There's more people than you thought here.

"Hello everyone! We have an extra special performance for you all tonight. Please, move along to the market plaza, and we'll show you the show of your lives!" As the man says this, they twirl with their arms out.

Some other people dressed in similar purple outfits are carrying boxes onto the boat. The man and a few people behind him turn and set off in the direction of the market. The crowd curiously begins behind him.

Go back to your houseStay in the street by the docksFollow them to the market
